echoLD 0.99.0

echoLD: Getting Started

Author: Brian M. Schilder

Most recent update: Aug-29-2021

Source: vignettes/echoLD.Rmd
echoLD.Rmd
library(echoLD)

data("BST1"); data("locus_dir");

BST1 <- BST1[seq(1,100),]
locus_dir <- file.path(tempdir(), locus_dir)

1000 Genomes Phase 1

LD_1kgp1 <- load_or_create(locus_dir = locus_dir,
                           dat = BST1, 
                           LD_reference = "1KGphase1")
## LD:: Using 1000Genomes as LD reference panel.
## LD Reference Panel = 1KGphase1
## + LD:: Querying 1KG remote server.
## + CONDA:: Identified tabix executable in echoR env.
## LD:: Querying VCF subset
## /opt/anaconda3/envs/echoR/bin/tabix -fh -p vcf ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nih.gov/1000genomes/ftp/release/20110521//ALL.chr4.phase1_release_v3.20101123.snps_indels_svs.genotypes.vcf.gz 4:14744974-16649679 > /var/folders/zq/h7mtybc533b1qzkys_ttgpth0000gn/T//RtmpyxKiGn/results/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/BST1/LD/BST1.1KGphase1.vcf
## Removing 1 files.
## Removing 0 files.
## LD:BCFTOOLS:: Compressing vcf file...
## LD:TABIX:: Re-indexing vcf.gz...
## LD:BCFTOOLS:: Subsetting vcf to only include EUR individuals ( 378 / 1091 ).
## LD:PLINK:: Converting vcf.gz to .bed/.bim/.fam
## LD:snpStats:: Computing LD (stats = R)
## + LD:snpStats:: 26796 rows in bim file.
## + LD:snpStats:: 99 SNPs in select.snps.
## LD::snpStats:: Filling `MAF` column with MAF from LD panel.
## + LD:: Saving LD matrix ==> /var/folders/zq/h7mtybc533b1qzkys_ttgpth0000gn/T//RtmpyxKiGn/results/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/BST1/LD/BST1.1KGphase1_LD.RDS
## 99 x 99 LD_matrix (sparse)

1000 Genomes Phase 3

LD_1kgp3 <- load_or_create(locus_dir = locus_dir,
                           dat = BST1, 
                           LD_reference = "1KGphase3")
## LD:: Using 1000Genomes as LD reference panel.
## LD Reference Panel = 1KGphase3
## + LD:: Querying 1KG remote server.
## + CONDA:: Identified tabix executable in echoR env.
## LD:: Querying VCF subset
## /opt/anaconda3/envs/echoR/bin/tabix -fh -p vcf ftp://ftp-trace.ncbi.nih.gov/1000genomes/ftp/release/20130502//ALL.chr4.phase3_shapeit2_mvncall_integrated_v5a.20130502.genotypes.vcf.gz 4:14744974-16649679 > /var/folders/zq/h7mtybc533b1qzkys_ttgpth0000gn/T//RtmpyxKiGn/results/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/BST1/LD/BST1.1KGphase3.vcf
## Removing 1 files.
## Removing 1 files.
## LD:BCFTOOLS:: Compressing vcf file...
## LD:TABIX:: Re-indexing vcf.gz...
## LD:BCFTOOLS:: Subsetting vcf to only include EUR individuals ( 503 / 2504 ).
## LD:PLINK:: Converting vcf.gz to .bed/.bim/.fam
## LD:snpStats:: Computing LD (stats = R)
## + LD:snpStats:: 55675 rows in bim file.
## + LD:snpStats:: 100 SNPs in select.snps.
## LD::snpStats:: Filling `MAF` column with MAF from LD panel.
## + LD:: Saving LD matrix ==> /var/folders/zq/h7mtybc533b1qzkys_ttgpth0000gn/T//RtmpyxKiGn/results/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/BST1/LD/BST1.1KGphase3_LD.RDS
## 100 x 100 LD_matrix (sparse)

UK Biobank

WARNING: Takes substantially longer than 1000 Genomes methods.

LD_ukb <- load_or_create(locus_dir = locus_dir,
                         dat = BST1, 
                         LD_reference = "UKB", 
                         download_method = "axel", 
                         nThread = 10)
